name.description: A short human-friendly name for the sofware release

description.description: A short description of the sofware release

serialisation.description: How the parameters and results are serialised

title.description: A human-friendly title of the software type

description.description: A human-friendly description of the software type

serialisation.description: How the parameters and results are serialised, if different from global setting, required if global setting is not provided

request.description: URL, relative to Software Release base path, of a json schema for values expected by instance of current software type

response.description: URL, relative to Software Release base path, of a json schema for values published by instance of current software type

software-type.description: Value to be used as software type instead of the software type id (in order to use multiple diferent forms for the same software type).

shared.description: Define if the request will request a Slave or Software Instance.

index.description: Value to use instead of software type id to sort them (in order to display most relevant software types earlier in a list, for example)
